data.name: qryQuery.SelectStatement
data.value:
DECLARE @LanguageCode INT; SET @LanguageCode = {1};
SELECT SAR = BEN.LastName + IsNull(', ' + BEN.FirstName,''), Name = PRS.Name, Vorname = PRS.Vorname, [Fall-Nr.] = FAL.FaLeistungID, Zusatz = PRS.NavigatorZusatz, Modul = MOD.Name, Leistungart = dbo.fnLOVMLText('Leistungsart', FAL.LeistungsartCode, @LanguageCode), [Eröffnet] = FAL.DatumVon, Abgeschlossen = FAL.DatumBis, [AHV-Nr.] = PRS.AHVNummer, [Vers.-Nr.] = PRS.Versichertennummer, NNummer = PRS.NNummer, Geburtsdatum = PRS.Geburtsdatum, Geschlecht = CASE WHEN PRS.GeschlechtCode IS NOT NULL THEN dbo.fnGetGenderMLTitleMF(PRS.GeschlechtCode, @LanguageCode) ELSE '?' END, Strasse = PRS.WohnsitzStrasse, StrasseNr = PRS.WohnsitzHausNr, PLZ = PRS.WohnsitzPLZ, Ort = PRS.WohnsitzOrt, Kanton = PRS.WohnsitzKanton, Zivilstand = dbo.fnLOVMLText('Zivilstand', PRS.ZivilstandCode, @LanguageCode), [Nationalität] = CASE @LanguageCode WHEN 1 THEN PRS.Nationalitaet WHEN 2 THEN PRS.NationalitaetFR WHEN 3 THEN PRS.NationalitaetIT ELSE PRS.Nationalitaet END, Heimatort = PRS.Heimatort, [Zuständige Gemeinde] = dbo.fnLOVMLText('GemeindeSozialdienst', FAL.GemeindeCode, @LanguageCode), UserID$ = BEN.UserID, BaPersonID$ = PRS.BaPersonID FROM dbo.XUser BEN WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) INNER JOIN dbo.FaLeistung FAL WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON FAL.UserID = BEN.UserID INNER JOIN dbo.XModul MOD WITH (READUNCOMMITTED) ON MOD.ModulID = FAL.ModulID INNER JOIN dbo.vwPerson PRS ON PRS.BaPersonID = FAL.BaPersonID WHERE 1 = 1 AND (PRS.PersonSichtbarSDFlag = dbo.fnGetPersonSichtbarFlag({0}) OR PRS.PersonSichtbarSDFlag = 1) --- AND BEN.UserID = {edtUserID.LookupID} --- AND PRS.Name + isNull(', ' + PRS.Vorname,'') LIKE {edtKlient} + '%' --- AND FAL.ModulID = {edtModulID} --- AND FAL.LeistungsartCode = {edtBfsLeistungsart} --- AND ({edtNurAktive} = 0 OR FAL.DatumBis IS NULL) --- AND FAL.DatumVon <= {edtDatumBis} --- AND (FAL.DatumBis IS NULL OR FAL.DatumBis >= {edtDatumVon})

data.name: qryListe2.SelectStatement
